item.title: Historical Haunted Bayou Cruise
item.description: Take an eerie adventure into the mystical marshes of Bayou Caddy, where old souls linger in the mist, on this cruise from Bay St. Louis. Explore haunted back bayous along the Mississippi Sound, guided by the tales of “Mystic Molly.” This one-of-a-kind tour features a musical theme, a haunting hour-long ride, and the option to purchase hot chocolate and s'mores at the creepy camp post-cruise.

image.alt: Historical Haunted Bayou Cruise

item.title: Hard Rock Cafe Biloxi
item.description: Biloxi, Mississippi played a central role in the evolution of Jazz, and you can celebrate this heritage with a tasty meal at Hard Rock Cafe Biloxi. Choose from a prix-fixe menu of options such as New York strip steak or ribs, or opt for salmon, a chicken sandwich, or BBQ pulled pork with fries. See classic musical memorabilia that adorns the restaurant walls, and all meals are served with dessert and a drink for an enjoyable meal in Biloxi.

image.alt: Hard Rock Cafe Biloxi

item.title: The Spirit Ghost Walking Tour
item.description: See the spooky side of Bay St. Louis while enjoying drinks with this guided walking tour, which focuses on the haunted side of the city. Hear spooky stories of paranormal activity from your guide as you visit some of the most eerie sites in the historic district, with the opportunity to grab drinks along the way.

image.alt: The Spirit Ghost Walking Tour

item.title: Vicksburg Battlefield Self-Guided Driving Tour
item.description:
Bring history to life with this self-guided driving tour of the Vicksburg Battlefield, where Union and Confederate forces fought for control of the Mississippi River. Explore the battlefield and its powerful memorials as you hear about General Grant’s march on Vicksburg, the Confederate resistance, and the bloody Siege of Vicksburg itself. Revisit tales of bravery, strategy, and grit with dramatic blow-by-blow accounts of the struggle and its nation-altering aftermath.
Purchase one tour per car, not per person. Everyone listens together!
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!
This isn't an entrance ticket. Check opening hours before your visit.

image.alt: Vicksburg Battlefield Self-Guided Driving Tour

item.title: Biscuit and Brunch Class with Chef Regina
item.description: You will learn so much from Chef Regina. It is a very personal, informative experience. Classes are limited to eight guests. You get to eat a wonderful brunch with new friends. You are welcome to bring any alcoholic beverage you like. If you let Regina know what set ups you need, she is happy to provide those. Bottled water and juice is available for all classes. You will also leave with a special gift from Chef Regina. Her Tea towel with her biscuit recipe printed on it and a biscuit cutter.

image.alt: Biscuit and Brunch Class with Chef Regina

item.title: Skip the Line: GRAMMY Museum Mississippi General Admission Ticket
item.description: Pre-book tickets to the GRAMMY Museum Mississippi for access to high-tech exhibits and music history. Securing your GRAMMY Museum Mississippi tickets in advance is a time-saving strategy for a stress-free arrival, and a blend of interactive features and multimedia features explores Mississippi’s soulful heritage.

image.alt: Skip the Line: GRAMMY Museum Mississippi General Admission Ticket

item.title: Biloxi Blitz Scavenger Hunt
item.description: Get to know more about Biloxi, Mississippi without the structure of a guided tour when you participate in this app-led scavenger hunt. Your interactive, remote host guides you around town where you solve clues, accept challenges, and submit photos of items you find. Have fun while you interact with locals and explore the rich culture of the city.

image.alt: Biloxi Blitz Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Historic Natchez and Emerald Mound Full Day Private Tour
item.description:
Unearth the captivating history of Natchez, Mississippi, on an unforgettable private tour. Explore the Grand Village, a window into the rich Native American culture. Marvel at Windsor Ruins' majestic columns, remnants of a bygone era. Meander down the scenic Natchez Trace Parkway. Experience the grandeur of Stanton Hall, an exquisite antebellum mansion adorned with opulent furnishings and breathtaking gardens. Then, discover Longwood Plantation, a haunting architectural masterpiece frozen in time, its unfinished grandeur echoing the stories of the past.
Reflect upon the lives lived as you wander through the ornate tombstones of the historic Natchez Cemetery. Pay tribute to the courageous soldiers at Natchez National Cemetery, a solemn reminder of their sacrifice.
From indigenous roots to antebellum splendor, immerse yourself in the captivating stories that have shaped this remarkable city. Experience history firsthand and create cherished memories that will last a lifetime.

image.alt: Historic Natchez and Emerald Mound Full Day Private Tour

item.title: Nutty Natchez Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Nutty Natchez Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Bay Saint Louis Coastal Stroll
item.description:
Recognized by the Mississippi Department of Marine Resources and an official Gulf Coast Outpost Company. The walk is less than a mile and covers all the key areas. Old Town Bay Saint Louis which is a small eclectic town you will enjoy to see.
During your guided walk you will learn of the culture of the area, and hear History and legends over thousands of years old to present day. You may add a cocktail or two along the way as we journey through Bay Saint Louis with stories told like never before. We will also make a stop at a local coffee and ice cream shop just for you. Some other sites we will see:
Local Cemeteries, Historical buildings, The statue of Bienville, Muriel of 1699, Shops and Restaurants, and so much more Please dress for the weather, and bring an umbrella or rain jacket if it's raining. Please arrive at The Depot 30 minutes prior to touring time. Ice cream, coffee, and other beverages available to purchase along with a keepsake offered.

image.alt: Bay Saint Louis Coastal Stroll

item.title: Historic Battlefields Self-Guided Driving Tour Bundle
item.description:
This captivating bundle of self-guided audio tours immerses you in the battles of Gettysburg, Antietam, and Yorktown. Discover how the Americans finally defeated the mighty British empire in the decisive battle of the Revolutionary War. Then jump forward in time to two of the bloodiest battles of the Civil War, when brother fought against brother. Hear about the generals, unsung heroes, and blow-by-blow accounts of how it all unfolded.
Recommended: Purchase one tour per car. Everyone can listen at the same time!
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
This is not an entrance ticket. Check opening hours before your visit.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!

image.alt: Historic Battlefields Self-Guided Driving Tour Bundle

item.title: 30+ National Parks Self-Guided Driving Tours Bundle
item.description: Explore more than 20 national parks, monuments, and forests across the country, including the Grand Canyon, Joshua Tree, and Acadia, with this self-guided driving tour bundle. Enjoy the flexibility to travel at your own pace, with hands-free functionality, and offline access, so you can use it even in remote areas. Includes full itineraries, travel tips, audio guide, videos, and text.

image.alt: 30+ National Parks Self-Guided Driving Tours Bundle

item.title: Santa and The Rougarou's Creepy Christmas Cruise & Haunted Trail
item.description:
What Santa has an Axe? Mystic Ghost Rides would like to present to you Creepy Christmas Boat Tour, and Haunted Trail, featuring Santa and the Rougarou out on the Bayou.
Listen to Mystic Molly unfold masterful storytelling of a spooky Santa Fairytale, while gliding down the bayou to the Haunted Trail. Mystic Molly and her victims will step off the boat, and enter the haunted trail, in the midst of the swamp, and let nature take it’s course. Not wanting to go on the haunted trail, then stay back on the boat, in the deep dark cypress swamp. Enjoy the bonfire at the Creepy Camp and bring your own select drink if you dare! Smores and hot chocolate are available for purchase or BYOB Children 9 and up are recommended with parent consent and discretion. Children must know who Santa is to go on this cruise.
Old souls and Christmas traditions, in the mist of the marsh like never before.
Have a holly, haunted Christmas. Come if you dare!

image.alt: Santa and The Rougarou's Creepy Christmas Cruise & Haunted Trail

item.title: Historic Mobile and Bellingrath Garden Private Day Tour
item.description: Discover the rich history and natural beauty of Mobile, Alabama, on this private day tour, which begins with a visit to the Mobile History Museum. Here, you'll delve into the city’s fascinating past, exploring exhibits that showcase its colonial origins, Civil War significance, and diverse cultural heritage. You'll also visit the stunning Cathedral Basilica of the Immaculate Conception, known for its breathtaking stained glass windows and intricate frescoes. The tour continues with a stop at the historic USS Alabama, where you can explore the battleship and learn about its pivotal role in World War II. Additionally, you'll visit the Mobile Carnival Museum, where the vibrant history of Mobile's famous Mardi Gras celebrations comes to life through elaborate costumes, and exhibits. The flagship stop is Bellingrath Gardens, where 65 acres of lush landscapes and vibrant floral displays. This tour offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and nature showcasing the best of Mobile, Alabama.

image.alt: Historic Mobile and Bellingrath Garden Private Day Tour

item.title: eBike Rental Biloxi and Ocean Springs
item.description:
The Cruiser Go! features Electra's patented Flat Foot Technology® for ultimate comfort and control. Rethink "cruising" with a top-assisted speed of 20 mph through three levels of support with a rear hub motor. The easy-to-read LED controller monitors power support and battery charge. Cruising further and faster is easier, and more fun, than ever before. Great colors to ride in style!
Includes a bell, basket, water bottle holder, and chain lock for easy and stress-free cruising.

image.alt: eBike Rental Biloxi and Ocean Springs

item.title: New Orleans Full Day Private Tour from Biloxi
item.description:
As you arrive in New Orleans, you'll be embraced by the soulful sounds of jazz, the aroma of delectable Creole cuisine, and the spirit of celebration that never ends. Get ready for a journey through the heart of American culture!
Step into the lively French Quarter, where history comes alive in every corner. Explore the iconic Bourbon Street, famous for its vibrant nightlife and diverse entertainment. Don't miss out on the historic architecture, unique shops, and street performers that make the French Quarter truly special.
Immerse yourself in the city's history at the beautiful St. Louis Cathedral, the oldest continuously active cathedral in the United States. Wander through the historic neighborhoods and discover the captivating stories behind New Orleans' magnificent buildings.
No visit to New Orleans is complete without sampling its famous cuisine. From beignets at Café du Monde and much more! This is a part walking and driving tour.

image.alt: New Orleans Full Day Private Tour from Biloxi

item.title: Private Professional Holiday Photoshoot in Biloxi
item.description: Capture the memories of your trip to Biloxi with a professional photo shoot for you and your private group of up to ten people. Have your photos taken at Biloxi’s most scenic beach and hidden gems you won’t discover on your own, and receive 45 professionally edited photos in less than a week.

image.alt: Private Professional Holiday Photoshoot in Biloxi

item.title: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Tupelo MS
item.description:
Step into the shoes of a newly-minted detective, tasked by Commander Mahoney to solve a gripping case murder on the streets of Tupelo.
Throughout this crime-solving audio adventure, visit each of the 10 mapped locations. You'll have the option to explore the downtown area using the Walking Map or follow a Driving Map on the city's outskirts. Once you choose, the exact starting point will be revealed. *See images for route.
Park or stop at each location, listen to the audio story, and put your detective skills to the test by gathering clues and piecing together the evidence. Finally, make your deductions and issue an arrest warrant.
Your overall detective skills will be evaluated, culminating in a Case Performance Score to measure your sleuthing prowess. This game is suitable for solo detectives, dynamic duos, or groups of mystery enthusiasts, offering an immersive audio tale filled with intrigue.

image.alt: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Tupelo MS

item.title: Natchez Trace Parkway Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description:
Explore the Tennessee and Alabama stretches of the Natchez Trace Parkway with this self-guided driving tour. Traverse the historical route of this unique national park, a 444-mile journey from Natchez, Mississippi, to Nashville, Tennessee. Discover natural, cultural, and historic sites, experiencing a journey free from commercial interruption. Drive in either direction and immerse yourself in the untouched beauty and rich stories of the American South.
Purchase one tour per car, not per person. Everyone listens together!
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!
This isn't an entrance ticket. Check opening hours before your visit.

image.alt: Natchez Trace Parkway Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.title: Devil's Swamp Walk
item.description:
Recognized by The Mississippi Department of Marine Resources and official Gulf Coast Outpost Company. Guided walking tour in the Cypress swamp viewing the wetlands, ecosystem, and habitat of the area
I invite you to visit Gulf Coast Eco Tour to experience the power of nature. Discover the culture of the area while exploring the wildlife, ecosystem, and the habitat of the Cypress Swamp. Our guided tour is for nature enthusiasts and wanderers of all activity levels! No worries, we will be on a board walk trail exploring with an experienced guide, walking through the swamps and Mississippi bayou's, of the Pearl River.
While on the tour get ready to engage in an interactive live demonstration of various forms of hydropower. Witness sustainable energy in action contributing to a greener future and learn about conservation. See nature up close and personal with its unique vegetation, and home to the Cypress Tree.

image.alt: Devil's Swamp Walk

item.title: Groovy Gulfport Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. item.title: Natchez MS Self-Guided Audio Tours
item.description:
Be the hero of your own vacation at an affordable price. Audio Narration of 14 Points of Interest in Natchez MS.
If you don't want to be packed on a big tour bus full of people, book this self guided audio. Learn about the history and the culture, the romance and the beauty of the Old South. Natchez is the earliest settlement on the Mississippi River and home to the largest collection of Antebellum Homes in the United States. Wow!
Here's how it works. We'll send you a link, all you have to do is click and listen. Start and end wherever and whenever you like. You may google the sites and walk/drive to them as you listen. Audio is the only thing included.
No expiration- the tour comes with a lifetime validity.
This is not an entrance ticket to attractions along the route.

image.alt: Natchez MS Self-Guided Audio Tours

item.title: Longwood Natchez MS Audio Tour
item.description:
Important: Admission to site is not included and we are not affiliated with the House. But we can provide a wonderful audio narration- if you choose to stroll the grounds.
Experience Longwood like it's never been experienced before…an immersive audio experience that will bring the history of the property back to life. Learn about the residents and the architects of this plantation and all the characters that make this property unique. Roam the gardens and experience the massive live Oak trees, see the garden...
A 15 minute history of Longwood accompanied by poignant music. An absolute must if you plan on visiting this site. Entrance to Longwood (House Museum) is not included but you may enter and explore the grounds.

image.alt: Longwood Natchez MS Audio Tour

item.title: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Biloxi MS
item.description:
Step into the shoes of a newly-minted detective, tasked by Commander Mahoney to solve a gripping case... murder on the streets of Biloxi.
Throughout this crime-solving audio adventure, visit each of the 10 mapped locations. You'll have the option to explore the downtown area using the Walking Map or follow a Driving Map on the city's outskirts. Once you choose, the exact starting point will be revealed. *See images for route
